name: heart keychain
notes:
> **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase!
> [subscribe here][2]**

join my fb group to share your makes, get exclusive discounts, cal’s, and free patterns, join [here][1].

**you can find a video tutorial for this pattern [here][3].**

this crochet heart keychain pattern is a quick and fun pattern, it's perfect for gifting.

**the pdf pattern includes written instructions and a detailed photo tutorial.**

- skill level - intermediate.
- the pattern is written using english (u.s) terminology.
- hook size needed: 3.5 mm / e.
- yarn needed: dk (#3) weight yarn: 15 grams/34m/37yds
additional materials needed:
- 2 stitch markers
- 0.5’’ (1.27 cm) bead

**finished size:** 2.25” (5.7 cm) wide heart.

if you have any questions regarding the pattern, feel free to contact me.

you can sell the finished product on a small scale.
if you write about this product online, please give credit to the original pattern.

please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets, and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental. to the best of my knowledge, this pattern is my original, unique design.

return/refund policy: due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file, all sales are final.
